downloadTitle: Migrate your Windows Phone 8.0 DirectX Project to Windows Phone 8.1
downloadDescription: In Windows Phone 8.1, apps are delivered as AppX packages just like store apps for Windows 8.1—previously, Windows Phone apps were delivered as Xap packages; this difference brings changes to the project file in Windows Phone 8.1 projects.  This document describes how you can manually upgrade an existing solution for your Windows Phone 8.0 C++ and DirectX app to target Windows Phone 8.1.

downloadFile.name: Migrate your WP80 DirectX Project to WP81.docx
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/7/7/a/77a6ab92-e400-4962-b957-6556745f0dde/Migrate your WP80 DirectX Project to WP81.docx

detailsSection: In Windows Phone 8.1, apps are delivered as AppX packages just like store apps for Windows 8.1—previously, Windows Phone apps were delivered as Xap packages; this difference brings changes to the project file in Windows Phone 8.1 projects together with a different kind of manifest file. Unlike other kinds of projects, Visual Studio doesn’t upgrade C++ and DirectX projects to Windows Phone 8.1 automatically.  This document describes how you can manually upgrade an existing solution for your Windows Phone 8.0 C++ and DirectX app to target Windows Phone 8.1.
detailsSection_file_name: Migrate your WP80 DirectX Project to WP81.docx
